name: ColorMask

description.en: Creates a mask from values in input In equal to input Mask Color.
description.zh: 根据输入值来创建遮罩效果。

info.en: Values around input Mask Color to create the mask. Colors within this range will return 1, otherwise the node will return 0
info.zh: 遮罩取值范围，小于该值返回 1，否则返回 0

info.en: Soften the edges around the selection similar to anti-aliasing
info.zh: 对临界值的判断进行模糊控制，达到类似边缘抗锯齿的效果

main: vec4 main (vec4 Color, vec4 MaskColor, float Range, float Fuzziness) {
